course-description: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to web development, covering HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Students will learn how to build and design websites from scratch.

Get started with machine learning. Cover foundational algorithms and techniques for building predictive models.
Learn the principles of financial accounting, including balance sheets, income statements, and cash flow analysis.
Explore the basics of graphic design, including layout, color theory, typography, and image editing.
Discover the world of data science, including data analysis, visualization, and statistical techniques.

course-description: Build mobile apps using React Native. Cover UI development, API integration, and deployment.
